pages.name: Ritual of the Crusher
pages.text: Use a Ritual Diviner for easier contruction.

Breaks blocks within its crushing range and places the items into the linked chest.$(br2)$(#aaaa00)Air Runes: 4$(br)$(#aa0000)Fire Runes: 4$(br)$(#00aa00)Earth Runes: 4$(br)$()Dusk Runes: 4$(br2)$()Total Runes: 16

pages.title: Raw
pages.text: Increases the speed of the ritual based on total Will.

pages.title: Corrosive
pages.text: All blocks are broken to be processed with a form of cutting fluid. Overrides Silk Touch where applicable.

pages.title: Vengeful
pages.text: Compresses the inventory on successful operation. Currently only does one compression per operation.

pages.title: Destructive
pages.text: Blocks are broken down forcefully: all blocks broken are affected by Fortune III.

pages.title: Steadfast
pages.text: Causes all blocks that are broken to be picked up with silk touch. Overrides Fortune where applicable.
